text:
HackerOne, Inc. | Groningen (Netherlands)| Full-time | Software Engineer |https://www.hackerone.com/

We're empowering the world to build a safer internet. All technology contains bugs, but they can be eliminated safely if we all work together. Our platform makes world-class security accessible to everyone by connecting security conscious teams directly with thousands of friendly hackers who are eager to help.

We are a diverse and talented team of engineers who are driven to solve challenges with clean, quality code. Our team is agile, highly collaborative, and aims to be aligned and autonomous. We strive to continually improve ourselves by learning from our peers and growing from their feedback. Better software is built by working together.

Currently, we are looking for a Software Engineer to join our team located in Groningen. This is a full-stack web development role. We don't require experience in security; we simply encourage an awareness of the security implications of what we build.

For a detailed job description of this role please visit https://jobs.lever.co/hackerone/ac3452ac-1f25-4f48-bfd8-af18...

Or, feel free to send us a email for more info: careers@hackerone.com
